comments.comment: What needs to change is not the president but the current system, way of doing things. Mr Nagananda seems to understand this. Current system is so corrupted, whoever comes fall into it. Law is law to everybody. One Srilanka one nation. It is not about choosing a leader who is buddhist but one that has a vision to bring success to nation. Stop western countries interference with our ways of doing things, give our war heroes what they deserve not punish them (what do people expect in a war? we have not done what many countries has done we were saving ourselves instead of chasing Tamils out of the country), stop middle eastern muslim extremism.  Current/last governments have not done or even discussed to stop it spreading. Both are the same greedy for power so let muslim MPs do whatever. If law is upheld above all this would not happened, we could have saved many lives. Government is not letting police, courts do their job interfering bringing country's defence system to zero.  We can not let politicians getting rich when country's economy at a brink of collapse. Who is responsible for the  bank robbery? WHY do we let this happen? I hope people in Sri Lanka vote for change, realise there is a way out of this. Do not let the buddhism be a fact choosing a leader, Sangarathana is doing a fantastic job and we all can help. We need a leader who will stop other extremism  spreading. Save the country from terrorists attacks. Stop terrorism spreading at nip of the bud. If the have done that our economy would not break into tiny pieces today.
comments.author: Charmina Navaratnam

comments.comment:
225 ekkenekwath nathuwa aluthma widihata aluthma thaleta perfect jathika prathipathoyak ekka yana gamanak arambakaranna. Eka nithiyak , kalen kaleta wenasnowana arthika prathipathiyak , nil  kola rathu wenuwata  niyama sinhala le thiyana supirisidu ekama pakshayak ,kalen kaleta wenas nowana jathika nispadana kriyawaliyata uradena ekama adyapana prthipathiyak samaga 2025 wanawita lokaye hondama ratak , mathin thora desha hithaishin inna supiri dehayak bawata pathkatanna puluwan jathika prathipathi  malawakata apith ekam hithin deparak nohitha ekathu wenawa. Apita oni apema kiyana nidahas niwahal deshayak. 
Ada nidahasa nathiwela, horakama mathdrawaya bedaharima jathika prathipathi wela. Pita ratin hamadema enakan diwa dikkaragena inna hingana jathiyak wela. 
Apita monawada nathe ...apita monawada bari ....ai apita mehema une ...
Dan athi ...Enna ekwemu ...Rawana ugayak nawatha arambamu ....

Ek anshayaka development witharak rate diunuwa Pennanawa kiyala hithuwata ehama wenne ne. Ugath buddhimat kiyala hithan inna deshapalakayange Nosalaka arina podima dewal thami Ada loku prashna wela thiyenne. Logic walin ma rata palane karanna be. Oya vihiluwak vena eka witharai wenne. Ethatama rata godanaganna thiyea kenek ge chanda godai oba adu karanne, nethuwa hitapu kalakanni deshapalakayange newi, ratata shapayak wenna epa rata goda ganna dagalana  pakshayak nethi niweradi kenata sahaya wenna kuhaka novi.
